summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AgroLink CRM iteration 3. All requested features working correctly: Login with admin credentials, Dashboard with 5 stat cards, Notification bell with dropdown showing clients without projects, Archived Projects table with multiple columns, and Stage advancement blocking logic.
passed_tests: Login with admin/#Sti93qn06301616 credentials - SUCCESS
Dashboard loads with 5 stat cards (Projetos Ativos, Clientes, Com Pendência, Valor Total, Valor Serviço)
Dashboard statistics API endpoint returns all required fields
Notification bell visible in header with badge showing count (2)
Notification bell dropdown opens and lists clients without projects (CRISTIANO RONALDO, JULIANA GOMES)
Dropdown shows 'Clientes sem Projeto (2)' label with warning icon
WhatsApp contact buttons visible in notification dropdown
Archived Projects page loads with correct table structure
Archived Projects table has columns: Cliente, CPF, Tipo, Valor Crédito, Início, Arquivamento, Duração, Ações
3 archived projects displayed correctly
Project timeline shows 8 stages including GTA e Nota Fiscal
Stage advancement blocking works - shows error toast when requirements not met
Error message: 'Não é possível avançar. Pendências: Assinatura na agência pendente, Upload do contrato pendente'
Stage-specific checkboxes displayed (Assinatura na Agência, Upload Contrato for Instrumento de Crédito stage)
Pending indicator 'Pendente: Requisitos não completados' shown when checkboxes unchecked
Backend API: /api/auth/login - 200 OK
Backend API: /api/dashboard/stats - 200 OK
Backend API: /api/alerts/all - 200 OK (returns clients without projects)
Backend API: /api/projects?status=em_andamento - 200 OK
Backend API: /api/projects?status=arquivado - 200 OK
Backend API: /api/projects/{id}/next-stage - 400 (correctly blocked with pending requirements)
Backend API: /api/etapas - 200 OK (returns 8 stages)
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Existing data: 3 clients, 1 active project, 3 archived projects
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features from iteration 3 are working correctly. The notification bell shows clients without active projects (currently 2: CRISTIANO RONALDO and JULIANA GOMES). The active project is at 'Instrumento de Crédito' stage with pending requirements (Assinatura na Agência and Upload Contrato). Stage advancement is correctly blocked until these requirements are met. The Archived Projects page shows 3 completed projects with proper table layout.
